articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Messages to Foreign Party and State Leaders
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Messages to Foreign Party and State Leaders
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un sent messages to foreign party and state leaders in reply of their congratulatory messages and letters on the 69th founding anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The reply messages went to the first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba; the president of Nepal; the Lao president and general secretary of the C.C., the Lao People's Revolutionary Party; the presidents of Maldives, Bangladesh and Syria; the kings of Cambodia and Thailand; the president of Pakistan; the president of Palestine and chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization; the Emir of Qatar; the presidents of Tajikistan, Azerbaijan, Iran, Indonesia, India, Belarus, Guinea, Mali, Senegal, Equatorial Guinea, Congo, DR Congo, Tunisia, Algeria, Eritrea, Egypt and Dominica; the former president of Angola; the co-chairman of the Board of Directors of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation; the secretary general of the United Nations; and the director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, Tuesday received a message of greeting from Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine and chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization.
					 The president in his message said that he was pleased to extend the sincere and warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un and, through him, to the government and friendly people of the DPRK on behalf of the State of Palestine and its people and on his own behalf on the founding anniversary of the WPK.
					
					 He wished Kim Jong Un and the DPRK and its people bigger progress and prosperity.
					
					 He highly appreciated the DPRK for supporting and extending solidarity at the international arena to the Palestinian people waging a long struggle to achieve freedom and independence.
					
					 He affirmed that they will value the historic relations of friendship between the peoples of the two countries and develop them in conformity with the wellbeing and common interests of the two peoples.
					
					 He sincerely wished Kim Jong Un good health, happiness and success.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from C.C., South African Communist Party
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from C.C., South African Communist Party
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a floral basket by the Central Committee of the South African Communist Party Tuesday, the 72nd founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Senior Party and State Officials Visit Party Founding Museum
articles.content:
Senior Party and State Officials Visit Party Founding Museum
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Leading officials of the party and the state and officials of the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions visited the Party Founding Museum on Tuesday, the 72nd founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The visitors toured various places of the museum associated with the revolutionary history of President Kim Il Sung who brilliantly realized the historic cause of founding the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 They also looked round the house where the President stayed together with the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters after return home and a pool and the monument to party foundation.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Floral tribute were paid to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il by service personnel, working people, school youth and children on the occasion of the 72nd founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Seen before the statues on Mansu Hill was a floral basket sent by Kim Jong Un, chairman of the WPK, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Placed before the statues were floral baskets in the names of the party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, and institutions and industrial establishments and schools here, and bouquets and flowers.
					
					 Also placed before the statues was a floral basket in the name of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to the great leaders.
					
					 The statues of the great leaders at Kim Il Sung University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, the Mansudae Art Studio and other places of Pyongyang were visited by an endless stream of people.
					
					 Service personnel, working people and school youth and childdren across the country also visited the statues and portraits of smiling great leaders in their residential areas to pay homage to them.

articles.title: Dancing Parties Mark WPK's Founding Anniversary
articles.content:
Dancing Parties Mark WPK's Founding Anniversary
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students were held in different parts of the country on Tuesday, the 72nd anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Dancing venues including the plazas of the Monument to Party Founding and the Arch of Triumph turned into the sea of dancers as song "Glory to Our Great Party" resounded forth.
					
					 The participants danced, paying homage to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They danced, singing song "Our Leader Loved by People" with the boundless pride of holding respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 "Song of Youth" and "We Like Ardent Life" revved up the atmosphere of the dancing parties.
					
					 There were similar dancing parties in provincial seats.

articles.title: Art Performances in Pyongyang and Provinces Mark WPK Founding Anniversary
articles.content:
Art Performances in Pyongyang and Provinces Mark WPK Founding Anniversary
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Art performances were given in Pyongyang and provinces to mark the 72nd founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 There were performances given by art organizations in Pyongyang at theatres here.
					
					 Concert "Song Dedicated to Mother Party" was given by the National Symphony Orchestra at the Moranbong Theatre.
					
					 Revolutionary drama "Blood at an International Conference" and revolutionary opera "Victory of the revolution is in sight" were given at National Theatre and the Pyongyang Grand Theatre.
					
					 The members of the art squad of the Central Committee of the youth league gave a performance at the plaza of the Monument to Party Founding.
					
					 Performances were given by the National Acrobatic Troupe at the Pyongyang Circus Theater and the jugglery theatre of the National Acrobatic Troupe added to the pleasure and optimism of working people, school youth and children on the October holiday.
					
					 Artistes of the provincial art troupes in North and South Hwanghae, Jagang, North Hamgyong and other provinces also presented celebration stages.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The delegation of Russia's TASS led by Director General Sergei Mikhailov and other foreign guests visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun Tuesday.
					 They paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues at the palace.
					
					 They paid homage to the great leaders in the halls where they lie in state.
					
					 Then they went round the halls where the orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls which house the cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them for their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The participants in the events for marking the 70th founding anniversary of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Tuesday.
					 They paid homage to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues.
					
					 They made bows to the great leaders in the halls where they lie in state.
					
					 Then they went round the halls where the orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls which house the cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them for their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: WPK Encouraging Cause of Global Independence
articles.content:
WPK Encouraging Cause of Global Independence
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) has dynamically encouraged the cause of global independence since its foundation.
					 It can be well proved through the historical facts that had been witnessed in the closing years of the last century.
					
					 Before and after the collapse of socialism in some countries of the world, the international ideological and theoretical view on socialism was led to a great confusion.
					
					 At that time, leader Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the WPK, issued famous work "Socialism Is a Science" in November Juche 83 (1994).
					
					 His outstanding ideological and theoretical activities proved the truth that the man-centered socialism, socialism centered on the masses, is the most scientific, superior and powerful socialism and socialism is sure to win, thus instilling into peoples of the countries aspiring after socialism the confidence in its victory.
					
					 At the initiative proposition of the WPK, the Pyongyang Declaration was signed in April 1992, which served as a joint action program of the revolutionary parties of the world in defending and advancing the cause of socialism, dealt a heavy blow at the anti-socialist moves of the imperialists and encouraged the progressive mankind in the struggle to rebuild socialism.
					
					 Even in the period of unprecedented difficulties when the anti-socialist offensive of hostile forces was focused on the DPRK, the WPK demonstrated all over the world that socialism and justice are still breathing on the earth and their might are much stronger than the imperialists' high-handed and arbitrary practices.
					
					 Thanks to the independent politics and Songun (military-first) leadership of the WPK, the DPRK has resolutely frustrated the imperialists' nuclear threat and blackmail in the confrontation with the U.S. not only in the 20th century but also in the 21st century to demonstrate its might as a responsible nuclear weapons state and nuclear power.

articles.title: Papers Praise WPK's 70-odd-year History
articles.content:
Papers Praise WPK's 70-odd-year History
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers here Tuesday dedicate editorials to the 72nd founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Rodong Sinmun sayst the WPK foundation was the solemn birth of the revolutionary party of Juche, the new type party steering the era of independence, and that it was a historic event of great epochal significance in carving out the destiny of the country and people.
					
					 The paper goes on:
					
					 Thanks to the foundation of the Party, the Korean revolution has advanced along the road of victory with the powerful political staff and the Korean people have become the independent and heroic people being admired by the world.
					
					 The 70-odd-year history of the WPK is the glorious one in which it has firmly defended the socialist cause of Juche and dynamically advanced it.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung built the WPK into the Juche-type revolutionary party, mass party of the working people and steel-strong party unprecedented in the party-building history of the working class.
					
					 Thanks to the outstanding wisdom and wise guidance of leader Kim Jong Il the WPK developed into the genuine party of the leader, mother party and seasoned staff of the Songun revolution for the first time in history.
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un has further glorified the Party into the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Party as required by the new times and remarkably enhanced its leadership function and role.
					
					 The 70-odd-year history of the WPK is the brilliant route through which to set a example of the times in the building of a revolutionary party under the wise leadership of the peerlessly great men, and the immortal annals during which the truth that the victory of the socialist cause led by the WPK is inevitable is proved in practice.
					
					 Minju Joson says the high prestige and invincible might of the WPK and the party-building feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il are inseparable, and that their august names will be immortal with the development of the WPK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lauds Party-building Feats of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lauds Party-building Feats of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun on Tuesday dedicates an article to the 25th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On the Fundamentals of Revolutionary Party Building".
					 The work, published on Oct. 10, Juche 81 (1992), made a scientific analysis of the historic lesson in building a socialist ruling party and elucidated the basic principle of the revolutionary party of Juche theoretically, systematically and comprehensively.
					
					 The validity, vitality and everlasting viability of the Juche-based party-building idea and theory put forward by Kim Jong Il have been fully proved for 25 years since the work was published.
					
					 In this period when the worst adversity faced the country and times changed, the Party has thoroughly established Juche in all fields of the party building and activities with the Juche idea as a firm guiding principle as indicated by him in his work and, therefore, the organizational and ideological foundation of the Party has been firmly consolidated and its ideological purity further ensured.
					
					 The party has become a mother party forming a harmonious whole with the masses, experienced and seasoned party with high leadership arts and promising party which successfully ensured the succession to the Party's leadership, weathering the ordeals facing the revolution. This is because it has regarded his party-building idea and theory as cornerstone.
					
					  The party building, activities and work should be conducted as indicated by Kim Jong Il. Herein lies the invincibility of the WPK's cause. This is the immutable truth taught by history and reality.
					
					 The WPK will bring earlier the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche under the unfurled banner of the great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism with the Juche-based party-building idea and theory as ever-victorious guidelines.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Kim Jong Il's Exploits for National Independence
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Kim Jong Il's Exploits for National Independence
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The days of leader Kim Jong Il's leadership over the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean revolution as general secretary of the WPK hold a particular place in the history of our country, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is a noteworthy event in the history that Kim Jong Il firmly maintained the Songun-based revolutionary line, the ever-victorious banner of the Korean revolution, comprehensively pursued the Songun politics and ushered in the new era of the development of the party and the revolution.
					
					 Thanks to the peerlessly great man, our party could firmly preserve its revolutionary character and lead to victory the socialist cause of Juche without a moment's depression and stepping and our army and people, united close around the party, could achieve the proud victory in defending socialism without any vacillation, weathering grim ordeals.
					
					 With his firm faith and will for national reunification he provided the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration to establish the milestone for independent reunification in the new century. His patriotic leadership radically intensified the general movement for reunification and his noble patriotism and great virtues opened up a new turning point of great national unity.
					
					 With his ardent patriotism, outstanding leadership ability and noble traits, he wisely led the reunification movement of the nation to lay the strong foundation for achieving independent reunification. His undying exploits will shine long with the history of the prosperous nation.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will as ever achieve victory and glory thanks to the ever-victorious guideline set forth by leader Kim Jong Il and the wise guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: WPK's Feats for World Socialist Movement Praised
articles.content:
WPK's Feats for World Socialist Movement Praised
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea saved the world socialist movement from crisis despite the imperialists' desperate efforts to obliterate the cause of popular masses for independence and the socialist cause and is vigorously promoting its victorious advance and this is the historic feats of the WPK, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 For more than 70 years the WPK has led the cause of popular masses for independence and the socialist cause to brilliant victory, weathering the tempest of stern and complicated history.
					
					 Our Party has never followed any established theory and formula in socialist construction. It has dynamically advanced along the road of Juche only.
					
					 In spite of stern ordeals and storms, our Party upheld President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il as the centre of unity, centre of leadership, waging a vigorous struggle to protect and advance socialism, making headway against tempest of history.
					
					 Under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il possessed of matchless pluck and spirit of Mt Paektu and superb strategy, the WPK smashed the persistent moves of the U.S. imperialists to stifle the DPRK and fully demonstrated the might of Juche Korea.
					
					 The WPK honorably protected socialism of Juche and demonstrated its might as the invincible party leading socialism. 
					
					 The Pyongyang Declaration comprehensively reflecting the stand and way of protecting and advancing socialism was provided on the base of Kim Jong Il's socialist idea and theories of Juche.
					
					 He provided the programme for struggle common to many communist parties, workers' parties and progressive political parties of the world to save the socialist cause from crisis. This is the immortal feats which will shine long in history.

articles.title: DPRK Will Keep to Path of Simultaneously Developing Two Fronts: Minju Joson
articles.content:
DPRK Will Keep to Path of Simultaneously Developing Two Fronts: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Old lunatic of the U.S. Trump, speaking at the 72nd UN General Assembly, unhesitatingly spit out such rubbish that he would "totally destroy" the DPRK, something unbecoming for a politician.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday in a commentary terms the unprecedented wild remarks in UN history a hideous politically-motivated provocation as they are not his personal view but revealed the U.S. imperialists' sinister intention to put Korea under its control and dominate the world.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 At the theatre for discussing world peace and security, the U.S. conducted high-handed and arbitrary practices calling for war. This reminds us of the truth of history that a leopard never changes its spots.
					
					 The DPRK is a full-fledged UN member nation and a sovereign state. Yet, the U.S. is crying out for "total destruction" with inveterate repugnance against the DPRK. Such a bullying act only hardens our conviction that we were quite right when we chose the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts.
					
					 The U.S. frantic farce against the DPRK is a clear proof that the path chosen by the DPRK was right and it is the path of independence and justice leading to a victory.
					
					 Now that our option was proven to be right, we will keep to it to the last.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts U.S., S. Korean Puppet Forces for Seeking Rotation Deployment of U.S. Strategic Assets
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts U.S., S. Korean Puppet Forces for Seeking Rotation Deployment of U.S. Strategic Assets
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) --  The south Korean chief executive and Trump agreed on the escalation of the rotation deployment of U.S. strategic assets on the Korean peninsula at the "summit talks" in September.
					 As regards this, the south Korean puppet forces said that the U.S. has committed to the escalation of the rotation deployment of its strategic assets in the vicinity of the Korean peninsula, adding that the U.S. will commit itself to implementing it from the end of the year if possible.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday comments that this is a serious provocation against the DPRK and an extremely dangerous move to plunge the Korean peninsula into a crucible of nuclear war without fail.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The rotation deployment of U.S. strategic assets around the peninsula is a product of the U.S. aggression scenario to seize the military hegemony of Asia-Pacific.
					
					 What makes the Korean nation angry is that the south Korean puppet forces are blindly following the reckless action of the Trump group to unleash a nuclear war against the north on the Korean peninsula, pulling up the DPRK over its measures to bolster up its state nuclear force.
					
					 The puppet forces are begging the U.S. to escalate the rotation deployment of its strategic assets in the vicinity of the peninsula. This is nothing but a criminal attempt to do harm to the fellow countrymen in the north by force of arms with the backing of their U.S. maser - the worst treachery to deteriorate the crisis of igniting nuclear war, quite indifferent to the destiny of the nation.
					
					 However, it is as foolish an act as jumping into fire with brushwood on their backs.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to bear in mind that its strategic assets deployed in the Korean peninsula are the primary targets of the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK.
					
					 All of the puppet forces running amuck with the back of their American master will die of by-blow.
					
					 The escalation of the rotation deployment of the assets will be the suicidal option to accelerate their doom.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces had better ponder over the miserable result of their reckless provocation.

articles.title: U.S.-NATO Joint Drill against DPRK Blasted
articles.content:
U.S.-NATO Joint Drill against DPRK Blasted
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The U.S. began an interception drill simulating a ballistic rocket attack by the DPRK in Scotland together with NATO member nations. Involved in the drill which will last till October 18 are 14 warships including destroyers and frigates and 10 fighters and thousands of troops of Britain, Canada, France, Italy, Spain and the Netherlands under the manipulation of the U.S forces.
					 Leading papers here Tuesday in commentaries say this clearly proves that the U.S. seeks to inveigle NATO member nations into the second Korean war.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says the U.S. plan to inveigle NATO into the Korean peninsula is not just aimed to bring down the DPRK only.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 There are countries around Korea becoming a stumbling block in the way of U.S. execution of its Asia-Pacific domination strategy.
					
					 These countries are growing stronger. But there can be a change in the balance of forces in case the NATO force enters the Korean peninsula.
					
					 If the U.S. ignites a thermonuclear war on the peninsula, it can easily spill over into a worldwide thermo-nuclear war.
					
					 The U.S. continues to kick up the racket of frantic nuclear war drills even though the situation on the Korean peninsula is on the verge of the outbreak of a worldwide thermonuclear war. The U.S. is the kingpin escalating the situation and a fanatic keen on provoking a thermonuclear war.
					
					 Minju Joson says the army and people of the DPRK will further bolster up the nuclear war deterrence for self-defence and thoroughly foil the U.S. hideous criminal attempt to make humankind victim of its ambition for world domination.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Denounces S. Korean Authorities' Confrontation Racket
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Denounces S. Korean Authorities' Confrontation Racket
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces run amuck with the anti-DPRK campaign over the "human rights" issue.
					 These days the south Korean puppet Ministry of Unification cooked up the "2017 executive program" according to the "master plan for promoting human rights in the north" reflecting the seven "key tasks" to "practically promote human rights in the north by improving north Koreans' rights to freedom and social rights".
					
					 Such frantic moves of the south Korean puppet forces are a grave challenge to the dignified DPRK and intolerable acts of confrontation.
					
					 Now they kick up "human rights" campaign against the north, not content with their joining in the U.S. moves to ignite a nuclear war and impose sanctions upon the north like a shaggy dog.
					
					 The "human rights" racket much touted by the U.S. and the south Korean forces and the "nuclear threat to the north" are two-axes to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The final goal of their anti-DPRK "human rights" racket is to "bring down the system in the north" and "achieve unification under liberal democracy". The "master plan for promoting human rights in the north" is another "human rights"-veiled plan for confrontation of social systems.
					
					 The behaviors of the present south Korean authorities and those of the puppet Ministry of Unification are little short of the traitorous crimes of Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye groups which ran amuck with confrontation with the compatriots.
					
					 They would be well advised to mind their own business before faulting the compatriots in the north.
					
					 Although the puppet regime changed in south Korea, its ill fame as the tundra of human rights remains.
					
					 The south Korean authorities hurled thousands of riot policemen to brutally suppress the righteous struggle of civilians against THAAD deployment, monstrous means for a nuclear war of the U.S., and the high echelon of the south Korean military drive soldiers hard like slaves. In south Korea such human rights abuses have been disclosed one after another startling the world.
					
					 In particular, the present south Korean authorities protect the heinous inhuman crimes of the Park Geun Hye group which massively abducted women citizens of the DPRK and fabricated despicable plots to forcefully detain them in south Korea.
					
					 Those who make last-ditch efforts to hurt the dignity and social system of the DPRK will be the first target of its army and people.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces had better give up such pipedream to bring down the social system in the DPRK.

articles.title: Residents of S. Korean Kangwon Province Left Homeless
articles.content:
Residents of S. Korean Kangwon Province Left Homeless
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Residents of Kangrung and other places of south Korean Kangwon Province have been left homeless for several months since wood fires, according to the south Korean CBS on Oct. 3.
					 The south Korean puppet authorities have done nothing for the refugees so far.

articles.title: Significant Days of DPRK Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
Significant Days of DPRK Marked in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries to mark the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and its  72nd founding anniversary and the 91st anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					 Meetings, book and photo exhibitions and film shows took place in Mexico, Bulgaria, Iceland, Norway, the Czech Republic, Bangladesh and Myanmar from September 24 to October 4.
					
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos dealing with the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and photos showing the revolutionary activities of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were their works, and books and photos introducing the DPRK.
					
					 "Grand Celebration of 70th Founding Anniversary of Workers' Party of Korea in Presence of Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un", "Monument to Party Founding" and other Korean films were shown at the film shows.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico said that the WPK which was founded by Kim Il Sung and developed into the ever-victorious party by Kim Jong Il has led the indomitable struggle of the Korean people to a victory for a long time.
					
					 The general secretary of the Iceland-DPRK Friendship and Cultural Society highly praised Kim Jong Il as peerlessly elder statesman as he built the WPK into the most seasoned political staff and demonstrated the dignity and might of the country and the nation to the whole world.
					
					 The chairman of the Ostfold County Committee of the Communist Party of Norway noted that the WPK which holds Chairman Kim Jong Un in high esteem has led the Korean people's struggle to defend the dignity and sovereignty of the country and build socialism to a victory while consolidating the nuclear deterrence for self-defence in every way.
					
					 The deputy general secretary of the C.C., Czechoslovak Communist Party said that the exploits performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for the foundation and development of the WPK can be known well through the successes being achieved by the Korean people in building a socialist powerful state under the leadership of the party.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events held in Bulgaria, Norway and the Czech Republic.

articles.title: Regional Organization Supports DPRK
articles.content:
Regional Organization Supports DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- We call upon the progressive people in the world to extend support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle for defending the sovereignty, peace and security of the country under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 The African Regional Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People headquartered in Nigeria said this in a statement on September 25 to denounce the reckless remarks of Trump calling for "totally destroying" the DPRK.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 We can hardly repress our indignation at the U.S. president who hurt the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership and let loose invectives that he would totally destroy the independent Korean people at the UN arena.
					
					 All the Korean people, enraged at such reckless remarks, turned out in the final battle.
					
					 We severely condemn the reckless remarks of Trump against the DPRK and U.S. military threat against it.
					
					 And we demand the U.S. stop all sorts of hostile acts and threats toward the Korean people at once.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de respuesta a los jefes de partido y Estado de varios paises
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de respuesta a los jefes de partido y Estado de varios paises
Pyongyang, 10 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un envio los mensajes de respuesta a los jefes de partido y Estado de varios paises quienes le hicieron llegar los mensajes y cartas de felicitacion en ocasion del 69o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Entre los destinatarios figuran el Primer Secretario del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba quien es el Presidente de los Consejos de Estado y de Ministros de la Republica de Cuba, el Presidente de la Republica Democratica Federal de Nepal, el Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao quien es el Presidente de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao, los presidentes de Republica de las Islas Maldivas, Mongolia, la Republica Popular de Bangladesh y de la Republica Arabe de Siria, el rey de Camboya, el de Tailandia, el Presidente de la Republica Islamica de Pakistan, el Presidente del Estado de Palestina quien es el Presidente del Comite Ejecutivo de la Organizacion de Liberacion Palestina, el emir del Estado de Qatar, los mandatarios de la Republica de Tadjikistan, la Republica de Azerbaijan, la Republica Islamica de Iran, la Republica de Indonesia, la Republica de la India, la Republica de Bielorrusia, la Republica de Guinea, la Republica de Mali, la Republica de Senegal, la Republica de Guinea Ecuatorial, la Republica del Congo, la Republica del Congo Democratico, la Republica de Tunez, la Republica Argelina Democratica y Popular, el Estado de Eritrea, la Republica Arabe de Egipto y la Republica de Dominica.
					
					Ademas, figuran el ex Presidente de la Republica de Angola, el copresidente del Consejo de la Fundacion Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il, el secretario general de la ONU y el director general del Instituto Internacional de la Idea Juche.

articles.title: Cuadros de partido y Estado visitan el Museo de Historia de Fundacion del Partido
articles.content:
Cuadros de partido y Estado visitan el Museo de Historia de Fundacion del Partido
Pyongyang, 10 de octubre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 72o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, los cuadros directivos del partido y el Estado y los funcionarios del Consejo de Ministros, entidades de masas, ministerios e instituciones centrales visitaron hoy el Museo de la Historia de la Fundacion del Partido.
					 Los visitantes recorrieron varios lugares del Museo que demuestra de manera sintetizada la historia revolucionaria del Presidente Kim Il Sung quien llevo a feliz termino la causa historica de la fundacion del PTC.
					
					  Pasaron revista a la casa donde el Presidente vivia junto con los combatientes revolucionarios antijaponeses despues de regresar a la patria, la orilla de estanque y el monumento en memoria de la fundacion del partido.

articles.title: Periodicos coreanos condenan acciones militares amenazantes de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Periodicos coreanos condenan acciones militares amenazantes de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 10 de octubre (ACNC) -- Estados Unidos y los paises miembros de la OTAN realizaron en Escocia los ejercicios de intercepcion del simulado ataque de cohete balistico de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. En este simulacro que se efectua hasta el dia 18 bajo la iniciativa de las tropas norteamericanas, se movilizaron los 14 buques de guerra, inclusive los destructores y fragatas de Gran Bretana, Canada, Francia, Italia, Espana y Holanda, los 10 cazas y miles de efectivos.
					Esto comprueba que EE.UU. intenta introducir los paises miembros de la OTAN en la segunda guerra coreana.
					
					Asi senalan los periodicos importantes coreanos en sus sendos comentarios individuales divulgados el dia 10.
					
					El movimiento militar de EE.UU. no persigue el unico objetivo de atropellar a la RPDC, insiste el diario Rodong Sinmun y continua:
					
					En el alrededor de la RPDC hay los paises que obstaculizan la realizacion de la estrategia de dominio sobre el Asia-Pacifico de EE.UU.
					
					Ahora, se hace cada dia mas fuerte la fuerza de estos paises.
					
					Pero, en el caso de que se ubiquen las fuerzas armadas de la OTAN en la Peninsula Coreana, se podria ocurrir algun cambio en el equilibrio de la fuerza.
					
					Si EE.UU. provoca la guerra termonuclear en la Peninsula Coreana, esta se extendera con facilidad a la guerra mundial.
					
					A pesar de que la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana esta en el umbral de la guerra termonuclear mundial, EE.UU. libra sin cesar los ejercicios de guerra nuclear.
					
					EE.UU. es culpable del empeoramiento de la situacion y maniaco que trata de desencadenar la guerra termonuclear.
					
					El periodico Minju Joson senalo que el ejercito y pueblo coreanos intensificaran mas el disuasivo de guerra nuclear de caracter autodefensivo y frustrara cabalmente el intento criminal de EE.UU. de satisfacer la ambicion de tomar hegemonia mundial.

articles.title: ACNC denuncia la campana intrigante de DDHH anti-RPDC del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
ACNC denuncia la campana intrigante de DDHH anti-RPDC del Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 10 de octubre (ACNC) -- Los titeres surcoreanos arman alborotos anti-RPDC en la rama de "DDHH".
					En estos dias, el Ministerio de Unificacion titere trazo un "plan ejecutivo del ano 2017" segun el "plan principal para el fomento de DDHH del Norte de Corea" reflejado las 7 "tareas a ser impulsadas antes que nada" para "fomentar sustancialmente los derechos humanos del Norte de Corea al mejorar generalmente los derechos a libertad y a sociedad de los norcoreanos".
					
					Esta locura deviene un desafio a la digna RPDC y constituye una imperdonable maniobra de confrontacion entre regimenes.
					
					Los surcoreanos se sumaron a la provocacion de guerra nuclear y la campana de sancion de su amo norteamericano y ahora desarrollan hasta la campana intrigante de "DDHH".
					
					Los alborotos intrigantes de "DDHH", de que hablan ruidosamente EE.UU y su lacayo surcoreano, y la "amenaza nuclear del Norte de Corea" constituyen 2 ejes para aplastar a la RPDC.
					
					Asi, la campana intrigante de "DDHH" anti-RPDC de los titeres surcoreanos tiene por objeto el "derrumbe de regimen" y la "unificacion mediante la absorcion de regimenes" y el "plan principal" arriba mencionado no es mas que otro plan de confrontacion entre regimenes.
					
					La presente conducta de las actuales autoridades surcoreanas y los tipejos del Ministerio de Unificacion es un crimen antinacional igual con los cometidos por los maniacos conflictivos Lee Myung Bak y Park Geun-hye.
					
					Seria mejor para los titeres surcoreanos que se den vuelta a su redonda.
					
					Aunque se sustituyo el Poder el Sur de Corea se lleva todavia la infamia del infierno de DDHH.
					
					Es el Sur de Corea donde se revelan una tras otra las violaciones de DDHH. Por ejemplo, unos miles de policias reprimieron bestialmente la justa lucha de los habitantes que se oponian al despliegue de THAAD, demonio de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. y unos de la capa superior del ejercito obligan a los soldados a trabajar como si fueran esclavos.
					
					Tambien, las actuales autoridades surcoreanas amparan el inaudito crimen antietico de la banda de Park Geun-hye que secuestro a las ciudadanas norcoreanas y las llevo al Sur de Corea y urden una artimana para detener coercitivamente a ellas.
					
					Los ofensores a la dignidad y el regimen de la RPDC seran primer blanco del ejercito y el pueblo norcoreanos.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos deben tenerlo presente y abandonar su vana ilusion de derrumbar el regimen socialista.
